title: Abortion case: Supreme Court rejects woman's plea, says no termination after 26 weeks of pregnancy
selftext: The kid's going to grow up knowing their mother expressed her concerns about being able to raise them.
comments:
I’m confused by this story. 

No information on why the woman didn’t/ couldn’t terminate earlier, and no real detail on why she’s seeking termination at all.

There are lots of news items on this in the last 10 days. The gist is

. Accidental pregnancy

. Already has 2 children

. No resources to care for the 3rd child
That answers one question but why wait until nearly 27 weeks to terminate?
